TaskSettings.Description: Morphic: Capture entire screen to clipboard

FFmpegOptions.CustomCommands: -y -rtbufsize 150M -f gdigrab -framerate 30 -offset_x 0 -offset_y 0 -video_size 1366x768 -draw_mouse 1 -i desktop -c:v libx264 -r 30 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -crf 28 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart "output.mp4"

TaskSettings.Description: Morphic: Capture entire screen to desktop
Morphic: Record region to desktop with computer and mic audio

FFmpegOptions.CustomCommands: -y -rtbufsize 150M -f dshow -i audio="virtual-audio-capturer" -f dshow -i audio="Microphone (High Definition Audio Device)" -f gdigrab -framerate $fps$ -offset_x $area_x$ -offset_y $area_y$ -video_size $area_width$x$area_height$ -draw_mouse $cursor$ -i desktop -filter_complex "[0:a][1:a]amerge=inputs=2[a]" -map 2 -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -r $fps$ -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -crf 28 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -strict -2 -ac 2 -b:a 128k "$output$"

TaskSettings.Description: Morphic: Record region to desktop with computer audio

FFmpegOptions.CustomCommands: -y -rtbufsize 150M -f gdigrab -framerate 30 -offset_x 0 -offset_y 0 -video_size 1366x768 -draw_mouse 1 -i desktop -f dshow -i audio="virtual-audio-capturer" -c:v libx264 -r 30 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -crf 28 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -strict -2 -ac 2 -b:a 128k "output.mp4"

TaskSettings.Description: Morphic: Record region to desktop with mic audio

FFmpegOptions.CustomCommands: -y -rtbufsize 150M -f gdigrab -framerate 30 -offset_x 0 -offset_y 0 -video_size 1366x768 -draw_mouse 1 -i desktop -f dshow -i audio="Microphone (Realtek High Definition Audio)" -c:v libx264 -r 30 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -crf 28 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -strict -2 -ac 2 -b:a 128k "output.mp4"
